note.p: Scottish sheep-farmer. Farmed at Invergeldie and Dalchruin, Comrie, Perthshire; at Crieff, Perthshire, 1871.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Comrie 7/3), 1871 (Crieff 8/19)
Correspondence vol. 17, letter from A. C. Pagan to George Cupples, 16 July 1869
Scotland old parish registers births 882/30 19 Troqueer (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 15 January 2020)

p.hi: Scotland, national probate index (calendar of confirmations and inventories), 1876–1936
